DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial investigate pharmacokinetics insulin detemir healthy Taiwanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Insulin Detemir Healthy Volunteers From Taiwan
DOC.criteria: Considered generally healthy upon completion medical history physical examination judge investigator Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 27 kg/m^2 , inclusive Fasting plasma glucose maximum 6.1 mmol/l Nonsmoker smoke maximum 5 cigarette per day equivalent Participation clinical trial involve investigational product within last 3 month Subject history alcohol drug dependence Subject firstdegree relative diabetes mellitus
